definition: Don't get a reward if it's not deserved. (idiom)

sentences.english: "Lu mi cang Hutong" was the location where the governement stored grains.
sentences.chinese: 祿米倉衚衕原來是儲存祿米的地方。

sentences.english: The reign of Roman Emperor Nero was a reign of terror .
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼祿皇帝的統制是一個恐怖統治。

sentences.english: Towards the end of the tsog feast, Luding Ladrang offered each monk some cash and a white silk scarf.
sentences.chinese: 薈供結束之際，祿頂拉章供養所有僧人現金和卡達。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself

ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
